definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated

sentences.english: The brushes have bristles of animal hair, with a very fine point.
sentences.chinese: 毛笔用动物的毛发制成，笔尖很细。

sentences.english: Visible at that time, contend for effect bookman , furniture of snap up fine wood also is one of vogue.
sentences.chinese: 可见当时，争效文人，争购细木家具也是时尚之一了。

sentences.english: He has very thin legs and knobbly knees.
sentences.chinese: 他腿很细，膝盖呈圆球状突出。

sentences.english: Filling is stuffing and fixing with slurry mixture of raw lacquer and fine gray gypsum.
sentences.chinese: 补灰就是用生漆和细石膏调和成浆状举办填密和修补。

sentences.english: The particle size distributions of submicrometer particles during pulverized coal combustion were typically bimodal.
sentences.chinese: 煤粉燃烧细粒子的粒径分布呈典型的双峰分布。

sentences.english: There was a rich man who was clothed in purple and fine linen and who feasted sumptuously every day.
sentences.chinese: 有一个财主穿著紫色袍和细麻布衣服，天天奢华宴乐。

sentences.english: Cut the cabbage into fine long shreds.
sentences.chinese: 将卷心菜切成又细又长的丝。

sentences.english: Sections of the lungs at this stage would show larvae in the bronchioles.
sentences.chinese: 这时候肺部切片可显示细支气管内有蛔蚴。

sentences.english: To hammer or cut(metal) into thin leaf or foil.
sentences.chinese: 两条金箔固定在一根细金属杆上。

sentences.english: You can't work a fine pattern with a thick needle and wool.
sentences.chinese: 你不能用粗针和毛线绣那样细的图案。

sentences.english: Each category can be further subdivided, etc. , to use numbers to distinguish between organizations.
sentences.chinese: 每类又可再细分数等，用组织号来区分。

sentences.english: Let's say that you're at a hair salon and you have very fine hair
sentences.chinese: 假设你正在一家理发店，你的发质非常的细。

sentences.english: The spring of the silent night, thin cool, long thin flow cup text.
sentences.chinese: 春寂无声，暗夜薄凉，文字的杯盏细水流长。

sentences.english: In me the tiger sniffle the rose.
sentences.chinese: 我心里有猛虎在细嗅蔷薇。

sentences.english: He could not ponder the future, but he also couldn't dwell on the past.
sentences.chinese: 他不能思考未来，同时他也无法细想过去。

sentences.english: Worms reject the finer particles when feeding.
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓取食时丢弃了较细的颗粒。

meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
